question: Standard consistency of the cement is

answers.a: Consistency in which the needle penetrate to a point 5mm to 7mm from the bottom of mould.
answers.b: Consistency in which the needle penetrate to a point 5mm to 7mm from the top of mould.
answers.c: Consistency in which the needle penetrate to a point 25 mm from the bottom of mould.

1.less than 5 minutes

3.less than 3 minutes
